entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023
